name: storybook-router
description: A storybook decorator that allows you to use routing-aware components in your stories.
author: Gianni Valdambrini

scripts.check-versions: npm outdated; lerna exec --concurrency=1 --bail=false -- npm outdated
scripts.build-react: lerna exec --scope storybook-react-router -- npm run build
scripts.build-vue: lerna exec --scope storybook-vue-router -- npm run build
scripts.storybook-react-examples: lerna exec --scope storybook-react-router-examples -- npm run storybook
scripts.storybook-vue-examples: lerna exec --scope storybook-vue-router-examples -- npm run storybook
